EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners (1357250142.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi June, Professional insurances are part of our comprehensive program, we do not sell liability insurance. I have attached a sample certificate of what you would be covered under in the MBO Program. To review the program in detail, please check out my landing page <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html>. If you have any interest in learning more please let me know. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: junegraphic@verizon.net [mailto:junegraphic@verizon.net] Sent: Thursday, January 03, 2013 9:53 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners Hi Sara- I just need a quote for the information I sent you yesterday, is it possible if you could email me the monthly cost? Thanksjune On 01/02/13, Sara Conde<sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Dear June, Thank you for the inquiry you submitted at the MBO Partners website. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. Ill be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcURXsEBk6uyRK6rNiTDSc4KntfJzDOOMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcURXsEBk6uyRK6rNiTDSc4KntfJzDOOMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. To quickly answer your question, we provide business liablity insurace as part of our program, I would love to go over this with you in more detail. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcURXsEBk6uyRK6rNiTDSc4KntfJzDOOMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcURXsEBk6uyRK6rNiTDSc4KntfJzDOOMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcURXsEBk6uyRK6rNiTDSc4KntfJzDOOMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners!
